data.title: The Story â€“ Proventus
data.text:
Proventus is a family-owned, value-driven investment company as well as a progressive initiator and supporter of contemporary art, cultural projects, and social endeavors. Proventus has an ongoing, proven track record of active investments and activities spanning over five decades. Proventus is built on a foundation of thorough analysis with a long-term perspective. All investments and activities are based on comprehensive research and an understanding of the world as a whole.

Proventus was founded in Stockholm in 1969 and is owned by the Robert Weil family. In our investments as well as in The Robert Weil Family Foundation, our activities are built on the same core values and working method: taking action for the long term, finding tailored solutions, and working in close collaboration with carefully selected partners.
